title: I just remake when I see a janna on the enemy team and I'm a melee champ
body: I'd rather waste 3 mins than not being able to move for 20+

replies.body: Tbh Janna's powerful but I don't find her kite as disgusting as {{champion:201}} {{champion:117}}

go on, complain about a champion that has a knock up and a slow when braum exists
i strangely never had a problem with janna as morde, while i never won against braum

Braum's passive is OP by itself

Then you combine it with everything else lmao
Lol gl remaking since Rito still hasn't fixed it, by the time the 1st wave spawns/min and you don't dc before there's apparently no remake prompt.
Sounds like someone doesn't know how to dodge... o.o
Janna been doing this since her incarnation but people are only complaining about it now?
